author: andreas
content: Actually there's a story to this image. This place is near where we lived for 20 years, a little remote from Villach where we live now, but every once in a while, mostly when I see the doctor (who didn't move with us), I pass by. The last times I had always left the SD card in the reader and didn't have a spare card with me. That never happens to me, obviously only when I am in this place. This time, upon third attempt, I managed to get the picture ðŸ™‚
